title: stuck at 33%
body: when i open my league it says calculating difference and 33% is this a glitch or do i have to wait for it

replies.body:
When you're stuck at patching at or after 33%, it's because your patcher cannot establish a solid link to the patching servers. To resolve this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

It happened to me a while ago. For me at least, I had to update windows. On the the player support websites, there's a list of things for that problem. I think you can also fix it by running it as an admin.
